skins.selfIntroduction: I am the first regular aircraft carrier of the Sakura Empire. As such, I served as the prototype for later carrier designs. Please... just don’t mention Midway.
skins.acquisition: My name is Souryuu. Commander, from now on, please request my permission in writing before doing anything weird.
skins.login: Commander, your documents are ready. Please take a look when you have a moment.
skins.details: If this data can be of some use to you...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, why are you daydreaming? Please, get to work!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Take your missions seriously! Don't get distracted so easily.
skins.secretaryIdle3: All air units, lock onto the Commander and get ready to unleash your bombs!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... please refrain from disturbing people who are working.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You...! Do you want me to cut off your hands?

skins.shipDescription: If I can become stronger through this... Commander, what are you staring at? Don't you still have work to do?
skins.acquisition: If I can become stronger through this... Commander, what are you staring at? Don't you still have work to do?
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Here are the documents that I have prepared for you. Please make sure to finish them.
skins.details: No matter what situations may arise, you must always trust your judgment, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Have you finished your work? If not, please redouble your efforts.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You were spacing out again, weren't you? Heh, you can't hide anything from me.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hiryuu hasn't been her usual self recently. I wonder what's amiss? It's making me worried...
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you tired? In that case, please take a break. I shall handle the remaining work.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... Judgment shall be exacted upon you when work is over. Prepare yourself.

skins.shipDescription: I tried wearing something a bit different from usual, but I'm not sure it suits me... Commander, what do you think?
skins.acquisition: I tried wearing something a bit different from usual, but I'm not sure it suits me... Commander, what do you think?
skins.login: Even though it's the New Year, there is still no shortage of work left to do.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Teaching the children how to write New Years' cards is unexpectedly fun. Just reading their innocent thoughts is enough to heal me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I'm not some demonic taskmaster... As long as the work gets done, I don't really mind if you set some time aside to relax.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would you like to go visit the shrine with me?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, there are some plans for the New Year here. Would you please take a look?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, this outfit was not tailored for the purpose of satisfying your depravity.

skins.shipDescription: I am Souryuu of the Morals Committee. Our goal is to maintain public decency, increase student motivation, and... *Ahem*! Anyway, please allow me to oversee the school's moral codes!
skins.acquisition: I am Souryuu of the Morals Committee. Our goal is to maintain public decency, increase student motivation, and... *Ahem*! Anyway, please allow me to oversee the school's moral codes!
skins.login: I think Hiryuu is in her rebellious age... She won't wear the clothes I picked out for her, and she won't walk to school with me... As her sister, it's making me feel a little bummed out.
skins.details: I may be in the Morals Committee, but that doesn't mean I want to become a fusspot.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Please don't joke like that. My disciplined, respectful, dependable, good-mannered, and very well-raised little sister would never end up as a dirty delinquent!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hiryuu's in her rebellious age... *Sigh*... Perhaps it's best to leave her alone for a while...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I have my planes monitoring every nook and cranny of the school. I recommend you don't do anything that would oppose school conduct.
skins.secretaryTouch: I've been talking to Hiryuu less, yet her mood hasn't improved at all... S-she's not going to run away from home, is she?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: All planes, prepare for takeoff! No, wait, prepare to strike!
